data.title: Rossie Sunrise Ceremony
data.desc: Welcome the day from above as the sky blushes in rose gold — a serene ceremony bathed in morning light

data.title: Rossie Love in the Air
data.desc: Say yes among the clouds — a breathtaking proposal framed by Bali’s horizon.

data.title: Rossie Aerial Elopement
data.desc: Begin forever with a flight — an intimate wedding soaring high in elegance and emotion.

data.title: Rossie Night Bloom
data.desc: A rare journey beneath the stars,  where city lights flicker below and romance blooms in the night sky.
